text: Croatia competed at the 1994 Winter Olympics in Lillehammer, Norway with three athletes in two sports. == Alpine skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="5"|Final |- !Run 1 !Run 2 !Run 3 !Total !Rank |- |rowspan=3|Vedran Pavlek |Super-G |colspan=3 bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|1:38.51 !align="center"|41 |- |Giant Slalom |align="center"|1:32.13 |align="center"|1:26.78 |bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|2:58.91 !align="center"|27 |- |Slalom |colspan=5 align="center"|DNF |} ==Cross country skiing== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="6"|Final |- !Start !Rank !Time !Rank !Total !Rank |- |rowspan=4|Antonio Rački |10 km Classical |colspan=4 bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|28:58.6 !align="center"|79 |- |15 km Free Pursuit |align="center"|+04:38 !align="center"|79 |align="center"|43:40.8 !align="center"|71 |align="center"|+12:30.0 !align="center"|71 |- |30 km Free |colspan=4 bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|1:25:42.4 !align="center"|62 |- |50 km Classical |colspan=4 bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|2:23:23.4 !align="center"|52 |- |rowspan=4|Siniša Vukonić |10 km Classical |colspan=4 bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|27:17.5 !align="center"|56 |- |15 km Free Pursuit |align="center"|+02:57 !align="center"|56 |align="center"|39:28.3 !align="center"|44 |align="center"|+6:36.5 !align="center"|44 |- |30 km Free |colspan=4 bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|1:21:57.2 !align="center"|44 |- |50 km Classical |colspan=4 bgcolor="wheat"| |align="center"|2:24:12.6 !align="center"|54 |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1994 Winter Olympics 1994
